modName: MACFKit - Make a Custom Follower Kit
summary: Are you tired of cookie cutter followers? Why not make your very own custom voiced follower with its own framework with MACFKIT
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][size=5]MACFKit



[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]https://scontent.fads1-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t34.0-12/19964859_1946116692337706_1766952518_n.png?oh=427850c3f44b144bcb3ec4de97586236&oe=59665BE8[/img][/url]


[/size][/color]





[youtube]Z8v1BcVNwLU[/youtube]

[size=4]
[color=#00ffff]This video forgot a wait and favor, make sure you look over the tutorial in the download after watching the video, if you choose to[/color][/size]






[size=4]This follower kit was built to try and rid of the cookie cutter followers, and bring interesting custom voiced followers into the world of Skyrim![/size]

[size=4]This kit includes a "do it yourself" folder showing a detailed tutorial
(for those who can make a vanilla follower)[/size]
[size=4]and a "kit" for those like me whom want to be lazy.


You are expected to know how to make a vanilla follower
before trying to make a custom one (or at least know how to swap meshes and textures)


[/size][color=#ff0000][size=5]This kit shows you how to make a custom follower framework[/size][/color]
[size=4]


You can use this on any old (already made follower) and just follow the simple tutorial, all steps are given to you.




If you've never made a follower, but want to bring one to life, follow this tutorialÂ 



[youtube]xcHw4sqrrx8[/youtube]



Once you create a normal follower, make a backup, then follow this file's tutorial




From a user who was asking for help,
he looked over the tutorial once again and got it "down" be proud of yourself

[img]https://scontent.fads1-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t34.0-12/19389807_1932037510412291_1435623591_n.jpg?oh=306ca862d1f47a5e78d89f217a8fbfdd&oe=59498103[/img]

[/size][/center]
author: BoneTongue
